trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Nashua
There were no other sightings in Nashua on or around November 16th 2001
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home after early movie years ago. Came to stop sign at said intersection. Saw enormous object hovering over tree tops and several homes. Looked at it for a minute, was frighened so continued down the street. Turned car around in condos on left side of road. Drove back but it was gone. No sound...just gone. My husband was in the car behind me and wittnesed it as well. Willing to try hypnosis to remember specific details and or lie detector test
Summary: enormous silent hovering object, (3) Norelco razor shaped lights...many groupings of (3) on bottom kept driving looked back it was gone
